sn35.157:3.1: 157 The Exterior and the End of Relishing
sn35.157:4.1: “Mendicants, sights really are impermanent. A mendicant sees that they are impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.157:4.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.157:4.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
